latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Exits and other egress not provided with required signage at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had age appropriate immunizations unless a child is exempt
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Daily schedule not provided or maintained at time of inspection
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Written behavior management policy not provided at time of inspection distributed to staff or made available to parents
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
